responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "B07FEFA64D022156C050D581771F4FD3", "Are you familiar with Hassan Sahar, the great adventurer and poet of legend? Somewhere around here he had found the Ring of Mourning. We only need to get a close look at what\'s at the Circle of Stones, and compare it with what we know from his descriptions.")
name: CSQ_DialDef_0013_AkhundBahrani_Camp_34
